charaepi_ch0101_10_mei/2301_1101_0100_20:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] was in the forest
one day, taking a nice, leisurely stroll...
charaepi_ch0101_10_mei/2301_1101_0200_20: when [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] came across a Delibird.
charaepi_ch0101_10_mei/2301_1101_0300_20:
The Delibird didn’t even seem to notice
[Name:PlayerNickname ] and continued picking
things up from the ground...
charaepi_ch0101_10_mei/2301_1201_0500_10:
Don’t disappear on me like that!
I was looking everywhere for you!
charaepi_ch0101_10_mei/2301_1201_0600_10:
Oh, hey! I didn’t see you there,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
charaepi_ch0101_10_mei/2301_0401_0800_10:
Hide-and-seek... Is that what you were doing,
Delibird? I suppose there are a lot of hiding
places here among all these trees.
charaepi_ch0101_10_mei/2301_0401_0900_10:
Huh? Wait a minute... I feel like Delibird’s tail
looks heavier than when we started out.
charaepi_ch0101_10_mei/2301_0401_1000_10:
She wasn’t playing hide-and-seek! She must
have been picking things up and putting them in
her tail!
charaepi_ch0101_10_mei/2301_0402_1200_10:
Delibird and I were taking a walk, but then she
just disappeared on me.
charaepi_ch0101_10_mei/2301_0402_1300_10:
It looks like something caught her eye and she
started picking things up. Did you find anything
nice, Delibird?
charaepi_ch0101_10_mei/2301_1201_1500_10: Oh wow, such a pretty Berry! Is it for me?
charaepi_ch0101_10_mei/2301_1201_1600_10:
Delibird have a habit of sharing their food with
other Pokémon and people.
charaepi_ch0101_10_mei/2301_1201_1700_10:
It looks like she came here to gather Berries
to eat.
charaepi_ch0101_10_mei/2301_0301_1800_10:
Maybe she wants to give you
a present.
charaepi_ch0101_10_mei/2301_0401_1900_10:
Delibird...did you want to come to the forest so
you could get this gift for me?
charaepi_ch0101_10_mei/2301_0401_2000_10:
Oh my gosh, you are way too precious!
I’m so happy I could cry!
charaepi_ch0101_10_mei/2301_0401_2100_10: Thank you, thank you, thank you, Delibird!
charaepi_ch0101_10_mei/2301_0302_2200_10:
Do you think it’s just
natural behavior?
charaepi_ch0101_10_mei/2301_0402_2300_10: Well, if it isn’t from habit, what could it...
charaepi_ch0101_10_mei/2301_0402_2400_10:
Wait! I gave her some cookies I baked earlier,
so maybe she wanted to give me a present
in return!
charaepi_ch0101_10_mei/2301_0402_2500_10:
Thank you sooo much, Delibird!
You’re so thoughtful! I love it!
charaepi_ch0101_10_mei/2301_1101_2600_20:
Delibird held out another Berry for
[Name:PlayerNickname ].
charaepi_ch0101_10_mei/2301_1201_2700_10:
It looks like she wants to give you a present, too!
Go ahead—take it!
charaepi_ch0101_10_mei/2301_1101_2800_20:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] took the Berry that
[EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] was offered.
charaepi_ch0101_10_mei/2301_1201_2900_10:
*giggle*
Delibird always amazes me with how 
thoughtful she is.
charaepi_ch0101_10_mei/2301_1201_3000_10:
Siebold told me that if I learn the true meaning of
hospitality from Delibird, it would improve my
cooking skills.
charaepi_ch0101_10_mei/2301_1201_3100_10:
I think I understand what he meant. Delibird
always works so hard for others, after all!
charaepi_ch0101_10_mei/2301_1201_3200_10:
I hope I can become a better cook so I can use
food to make all my friends happy!
charaepi_ch0101_10_mei/2301_1201_3300_10:
But that being said...
Hey, Delibird?
charaepi_ch0101_10_mei/2301_1201_3400_10:
Don’t go running off like that anymore, all right?
I was worried sick about you!
charaepi_ch0101_10_mei/2301_1201_3500_10:
Delibird always moves to the beat of her
own drum.
charaepi_ch0101_10_mei/2301_1201_3600_10:
I think she’s always thinking of the next way she
can help somebody.
charaepi_ch0101_10_mei/2301_1201_3700_10:
Maybe if I become a better cook, I can relate to
her better.
charaepi_ch0101_10_mei/2301_1201_3800_10:
Do you think there’s another way I might be able
to become more like her?
charaepi_ch0101_10_mei/2301_0301_3900_10:
Why don’t you pretend to be
a Delibird?
charaepi_ch0101_10_mei/2301_0401_4000_10:
That’s an amazing idea! Did you know I’m great
at impressions?
charaepi_ch0101_10_mei/2301_0402_4200_10:
How to be more like Delibird... More like
Delibird... What if I acted like her?
charaepi_ch0101_10_mei/2301_1201_4300_10: Yeah! I can pick up Berries along with her!
charaepi_ch0101_10_mei/2301_1201_4400_10:
We can gather them up and then go around
handing them out as presents to everybody!
charaepi_ch0101_10_mei/2301_1201_4500_10:
What do you think, Delibird? Isn’t that a
great idea?
charaepi_ch0101_10_mei/2301_1201_4600_10: Let’s go spread some cheer together!
charaepi_ch0101_10_mei/2301_1201_4700_10: Delibird seems like she’s on board!
charaepi_ch0101_10_mei/2301_1201_4800_10:
Oh, and I’ll have a present for you, too,
[Name:PlayerNickname ], so look forward to it!
